channel.title: I need help with monster hp
channel.description: ok so im on one of those old rs servers were whip is best and no fighter torso i think its like 318 or something and i need help with npc hp. the max hp it can go to is 244 although i put like 300 and like kbd and jad only have 244 life so i was wondering if someone could tell me how to increase hp or maybe even make them have 3 lives or something befor it drops 1 item??????? *please help im beggin you*
